video.title: Hillbilly Blood
video.synopsis: Proud to be called hillbillies, Eugene and Spencer live off the land in the backwoods of Appalachia as their kin have done for generations.

episodes.synopsis: A long hike takes Eugene and Spencer to a secluded spot in the woods where they can create that staple of hillbilly existence: moonshine.
episodes.title: Hillbilly Blood: Season 1: Moonshine: Running Dry

episodes.synopsis: With food stocks running low and gun season weeks away, Eugene and Spencer build a powerful crossbow to land much-needed game.
episodes.title: Hillbilly Blood: Season 1: Hunting: The Mountain Provides

episodes.synopsis: When coyotes invade his family's chicken coop, ruining eggs they need to trade, Spencer joins Eugene in building an impenetrable replacement.
episodes.title: Hillbilly Blood: Season 1: Homestead: Under Siege

episodes.synopsis: Winter's approaching and Eugene realizes he doesn't have enough money to pay for heating, so he and Spencer hunt for gems to barter for fuel.
episodes.title: Hillbilly Blood: Season 1: Prospecting: The Hillbilly Savings Account

episodes.synopsis: With little use for money, Spencer and Eugene must find $650 worth of items they can trade for a new chainsaw.
episodes.title: Hillbilly Blood: Season 1: Barter: Money Can't Buy Everything

episodes.synopsis: When Spencer's truck strands him and Eugene in the middle of nowhere, they set out for home on foot with no food and temperatures dropping fast.
episodes.title: Hillbilly Blood: Season 1: Stranded: The Journey Home
